===Noun===

# A yellowish-brown pill used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to "remove ''damp-heat'', when there is ''damp-heat'' in the lower part of the body marked by redness, swelling, hotness and pain in the legs and knees, erysipelas of the lower extremities, morbid leukorrhea, or wetness and itching of the scrotum".

Ermiao Wan has the following herbal ingredients:
